019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.vmconlet;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import freemarker.core.ParseException;
023import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
024import freemarker.template.Template;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.util.HashSet;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.Set;
033import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
034import org.jdrupes.json.JsonBeanDecoder;
035import org.jdrupes.json.JsonDecodeException;
036import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.StartVm;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.StopVm;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged.Type;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
043import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
044import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
045import org.jgrapes.core.NamedChannel;
046import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
047import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
048import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
049import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleConnection;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
060
061/**
062 */
063@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
064public class VmConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmConlet.VmsModel> {
065
066    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
067        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
068    private final Map<String, DynamicKubernetesObject> vmInfos
069        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
070
071    /**
072     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
073     * 
074     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
075     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
076     * sends the event to
077     */
078    public VmConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
079        super(componentChannel);
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
084     *
085     * @param event the event
086     * @param channel the channel
087     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
088     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
089     *             exception
090     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
091     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
092     */
093    @Handler
094    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
095            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
096            ParseException, IOException {
097        // Add conlet resources to page
098        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
099            .setDisplayNames(
100                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
101            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
102            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
103                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
104                    type(), "VmConlet-functions.js"))));
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    protected Optional<VmsModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
109            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
110        return Optional.of(new VmsModel(conletId));
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
115    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
116            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, VmsModel conletState)
117            throws Exception {
118        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
119        boolean sendData = false;
120        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
121            Template tpl
122                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-preview.ftl.html");
123            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
124                processTemplate(event, tpl,
125                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
126                        .setRenderAs(
127                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
128                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
129            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
130            sendData = true;
131        }
132        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
133            Template tpl
134                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-view.ftl.html");
135            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
136                processTemplate(event, tpl,
137                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
138                        .setRenderAs(
139                            RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
140                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
141            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
142            sendData = true;
143        }
144        if (sendData) {
145            for (var vmInfo : vmInfos.values()) {
146                var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmInfo.getRaw().toString())
147                    .readObject();
148                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
149                    conletId, "updateVm", def));
150            }
151        }
152
153        return renderedAs;
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Track the VM definitions.
158     *
159     * @param event the event
160     * @param channel the channel
161     * @throws JsonDecodeException 
162     */
163    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
164    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary",
165        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
166    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
167            throws JsonDecodeException {
168        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
169            vmInfos.remove(event.vmDefinition().getMetadata().getName());
170            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
171                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
172                    entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
173                        conletId, "removeVm"));
174                }
175            }
176        } else {
177            var vmDef = new DynamicKubernetesObject(
178                event.vmDefinition().getRaw().deepCopy());
179            GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw()).to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class)
180                .remove("managedFields");
181            var vmSpec = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw()).to("spec", "vm");
182            vmSpec.set("maximumRam", Quantity.fromString(
183                vmSpec.getAsString("maximumRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
184                .toBigInteger().toString());
185            vmSpec.set("currentRam", Quantity.fromString(
186                vmSpec.getAsString("currentRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
187                .toBigInteger().toString());
188            var status = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw()).to("status");
189            status.set("ram", Quantity.fromString(
190                status.getAsString("ram").orElse("0")).getNumber()
191                .toBigInteger().toString());
192            String vmName = event.vmDefinition().getMetadata().getName();
193            vmInfos.put(vmName, vmDef);
194
195            // Extract running
196            var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmDef.getRaw().toString())
197                .readObject();
198            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
199                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
200                    entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
201                        conletId, "updateVm", def));
202                }
203            }
204        }
205    }
206
207    @Override
208    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
209            ConsoleConnection channel, VmsModel conletState)
210            throws Exception {
211        event.stop();
212        switch (event.method()) {
213        case "start":
214            fire(new StartVm(event.params().asString(0),
215                new NamedChannel("manager")));
216            break;
217        case "stop":
218            fire(new StopVm(event.params().asString(0),
219                new NamedChannel("manager")));
220            break;
221        default:// ignore
222            break;
223        }
224    }
225
226    @Override
227    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
228            String conletId) throws Exception {
229        return true;
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * The Class VmsModel.
234     */
235    public class VmsModel extends ConletBaseModel {
236
237        /**
238         * Instantiates a new vms model.
239         *
240         * @param conletId the conlet id
241         */
242        public VmsModel(String conletId) {
243            super(conletId);
244        }
245
246    }
247}
